import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { Input, Label, Button } from "@windmill/react-ui"; import { ImFacebook, ImGoogle } from "react-icons/im"; import Error from "../components/form/Error"; import InputArea from "../components/form/InputArea"; import LabelArea from "../components/form/LabelArea"; import SelectRole from "../components/form/SelectRole"; import useLoginSubmit from "../hooks/useLoginSubmit"; const SignUp = () => { const { onSubmit, register, handleSubmit, errors, loading } = useLoginSubmit(); return (

Create account

); }; export default SignUp;
